def convert_base_10_to_base_8(number):
    binary_number = bin(number)[3:]
    octal_number = oct(int(binary_number, 2))[2:]
    return octal_number

def convert_base_10_to_base_8(number):
    binary_number = bin(number)[1:]
    octal_number = oct(int(binary_number, 2))[2:]
    return octal_number
